page.title: 11VILLAGE & HOME LIFE (CONT'D)
page.content: Television is a popular form of entertainment and source of information and several Senior Citizens enjoy national sporting activities on ther different T.V. networtks. Gardening is a popular hobby. Some have home computers and children enjoy games, horse-riding and cycling. Some adults enjoy golf, tennis, swimming and darts which are all available outside the villages.Dogs and cats are kept as pets but some dogs are used for farm work and for guarding property. Most people are safety conscious, fitting burglar alarms in larger houses. Locks on windows and strong door chains are fitted in many houses. There are some crooks and unscrupulous characters about, not in the community but from outside the area.
